PageWidgetPortable.Title: CPV
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_CS_CPV.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.FILIAL = (SELECT Z.FILIAL FROM CS_CALCULOS Z WHERE Z.HANDLE = @RASTRO(CS_CALCULOS)) AND A.COMPETENCIA = (SELECT X.COMPETENCIA FROM CS_CALCULOS X WHERE X.HANDLE = @RASTRO(CS_CALCULOS))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t2503_at7895_hs7266d080.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
